mapper.insert: insert into Member (id, passwd, name, phone, type) values (#{ id }, #{ passwd }, #{ name }, #{ phone }, #{ type })
mapper.select: select sf.savedfilename from host h, space s, spacefile sf where h.hostid = s.hostid and s.spaceno = sf.spaceno and sf.flag = 1 and h.hostId = #{ hostId } and rownum = 1
mapper.delete: delete from Member where id = #{ id }
